name: downloadscreenshot
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool helioviewer_v1.
Tool description: Helioviewer is an open-source project for the visualization of solar and heliospheric data, funded by ESA and NASA.
API description: Download a custom screenshot (that was generated using the `takeScreenshot` API endpoint).

is_id.description: Unique screenshot identifier (provided by the response to a `takeScreenshot` request).
